name: Stay Safe (itch) (Ronnie0001)
description:
This game is based on the SIR model—an epidemiological model for explaining the spread of a virus through a population.   How to play

Credits

Game by Ronnie Sallan

Audio by Jake Archer

Thanks to the mentors on the Discord server who provided me with assistance in various areas during the game jam.

References The game provides in-game facts from WHO (World Health Organization) and CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention). Links to the sources of these quotes will be provided here soon. Misc.

This game was made for the Jamming the Curve game jam.
